__TOC__

	
* Contact: <nowiki>[[ChristianSantiago]]</nowiki>
* Make: ToughBook
* Brand: Panasonic
* Model: CF-29
* Website: http://www.panasonic.com/business/toughbook/laptop-computers.asp

----
* Processor : Intel(R) Pentium(R) M processor 1.30GHz 
* Chipset : Intel 855GM
* Southbridge : 2852/82855 GM/GME/PM/GMV
* Memory : DDR SDRAM - 266 MHz expandable to 1GB max (plus 256MB internal memory)
* Touchpad : Synaptic
* Audio : Intel Corp. 82801DB/DBL/DBM (ICH4/ICH4-L/ICH4-M) AC'97 Audio Controller
* NIC : Realtek Semiconductor Co., Ltd. RTL-8139/8139C/8139C+
* WiFi : Intel PRO/Wireless 2200BG Network Connection
* Video : Intel 855GM - AGP
* Display : 1024x768
----

=== Current Issues ===
** Blank Screen while on Battery Power causes the screen to blank when the lid is closed  and not come back when the lid is opened. Typing on the keyboard can resume the display.
** Touchpad does not work on Feisty. Touchpad responds on Gutsy, but no way to calibrate. On touch mouse  
     hovers to corner right of screen.
** Waking up from sleeps doesn't work always. Causes the screen to be all garbled.

NOTES:

(1) Fix for function buttons not working: 
 - sound - http://librarian.launchpad.net/1916123/acpi-support_panasonic_tsk20060402.tar.gz

 - brightness - http://www.netlab.cs.tsukuba.ac.jp/~yokota/archive/pcc-acpi-0.8.4-hy20070502.tar.gz

* see bug report here: https://launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/linux-source-2.6.17/+bug/62620

(2) Hibernation works after applying the above fixes to ACPI. It failed on my computer due to "Not enough swap file"

(3) Sound fixed in final version of Gutsy. External Amplifier needs to be set to ON.
